page.title: 05Community Association
page.content: In 1955 the Fawley and District Community Association was formed. This was to help improve life in the area,and so that people could have things to do during the day. When the association got the backing it needed they started to raise the money .It took 6_7 years to do this and in 1962 Fawley parish Council built a hall for them to use. Mrs M.Cock the warden helps to arrange a lot of the activities they do. The association is a registered charity,so that means it can't give money to other charities but it can rent out halls cheaply ,so they can raise more money for them selves. The Community also runs a play scheme for children in the summer. They also have a lot of other activities like Stamp Club and Tufty Club. A lot of the people are voluntary workers.
